text:
Provi | Senior Engineer (rails, react) | Chicago and/or REMOTE OK

http://provi.com - We help US bars and retailers order booze faster. We are a quickly growing startup working on a fun problem.

We offer competitive pay and benefits.

Looking for a self driven senior dev, ready to work on both backend integrations and lots of modern react frontend work. please reach out: eli [a t] provi [d o t] com
